event.title: Karsten Gerloff talk in Bergen
event.body:
Karsten Gerloff, FSFE president,will give a talk about general purpose computing as a question of power and control on October 18th in Bergen (Norway). Entitled as
"All watched over by machines of loving grace?", the speech is being organised by the Bergen Linux User Group and it will be held at the Bergen public libary (Str√∏mgaten 6)
